activities: When an individual in these countries registers on line to use the Moxtra service, they are asked to supply first and last name and an email address to contact them.  This information is stored in Moxtra's servers to manage the user's account.  The information is not shared with any third parties.
contactoff1: 1601 S. DeAnza Blvd, Suite 200, Cupertino CA 95014
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: first and last name and email address
recoursemech: American Arbitration Association/International Centre for Dispute Resolution Safe Harbor Program (AAA/ICDR)
